snippet.title: Switch - Or Die Trying - Xbox One Release Trailer
snippet.description:
'Switch - Or Die Trying' is finally releasing on Xbox One.
Very few Indian games (if any) release there.

Xbox One Release date : 28th February 2018

'Switch - Or Die Trying' is a deceptively cute hard-core platformer where you will die all the time, All The Time ! Die; keep trying.

Made completely in-house in India (Indie-ya).

'Switch - Or Die Trying' won runner-up 'Studio Game of the Year' at NGDC 2017

Controller/Gamepad strongly recommended.

Get it on-
Xbox: https://goo.gl/mrn5zw
Steam: https://goo.gl/FPstBY
Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Threye.Switch

Say hi-
Website: http://www.threye.com/switch
Twitter : https://twitter.com/SwitchDevs
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/switchgame

Music Attribution:
"Reckless" by Dysfunction_AL 
http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/destinazione_altrove/54482
Licensed Under CC BY 3.0
Modified for the purposes of this trailer.
